website_summaries.verdict: Workout bigger, smarter, and longer with top-rate lifting hooks.
pros: These stainless steel hooks save your wrists from strain by using a cushioned, hand-friendly glove design
Each hook is lathered in a sticky coating to preserve balance, allowing you to use proper technique in a variety of exercise
Adjustable wrist strap measures 17.5 inches to fit hands of all sizes
cons: Wrist strap is adjustable, but hook placement is not

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't lift without them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hooks because I am missing 4 digits on my left hand. I recently got back in the gym and these hooks have been a tremendous success. Even using them like this, without support of the fingers, they work quite well. I am able to do so many more exercises without having to substitute workouts. I've used them for deadlifts, shrugs, rows, pull ups, and many other workouts that would have been impossible without them. Amazing product that gave me amazing results!
customer_reviews.author: Blake Cuvillier

customer_reviews.title: Pursposeful design!
customer_reviews.text: Work very well to extend your sets beyond your grip strength...allows for a few extra reps especially for pull ups, pull downs, rows, deadlifts, etc. Not really for powerlifters who need crazy grip strength to compete. This is for more fitness and physique training to rep out. Great for women, too, since the can save their hands a bit from callouses, and to lift more weight without grip failing too early. I am a former power lifter competitor, but have a bit of nerve damage in my fingers and elbows. With these, I can still lift as heavy as I am capable of. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More Pullups!
customer_reviews.text: Normally you see people use this for deadlift assistance. I've been doing pullups for the last month. Ive taken a fascination with getting better at them. I noticed that I still had a little left in the gas tank but my hands were fatigued. In came these puppies. Using these to relieve the work on my hands in the later end of the workout and isolate my back, allowed me to push to get more reps in. That's where progression lies. Buy these! Built strong, Will last long, and help you increase you pullup max.
customer_reviews.author: Danny81

customer_reviews.title: Maybe ok fo lighter lifters
customer_reviews.text: I picked up a pair of these for a client with a bit of nerve damage. They ca lift decent heavy bu their grip doesn't match. Turns out they dd not work well, they would rotate too far and slip off. I gave them to an older female client who has used them happily. So limited in weight use sure. Buy again, no. I'll stay with suggesting straps
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: I don't use them all the time but for shrugs and pull-downs or last sets of pull-ups these can be a great addition to your gym gear
customer_reviews.text: These take some getting used to but have enabled some lifts that I wasn't able to perform without them. I can get up to 4 - 45# plates on each side for shrugs with these. Before these my hands failed way before my traps. I wish these came in women's sizes though as finding a way to get your hands on the bar between and around these hooks can be challenging. I don't use them all the time but for shrugs and pull-downs or last sets of pull-ups these can be a great addition to your gym gear. No compensation whatsoever for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Scientess

customer_reviews.title: These are great lifting hooks!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned these now for about three weeks and they’ve performed flawlessly. I’ve injured my hands and have virtually no grip strength right now so these really help. I’m 220lbs and have been able to do pulls as well as deadlifting up to 275lbs. If you’re using them to support most of the weight I wouldn’t go much heavier then that. Just my opinion. The cuffs are comfortable and the hooks fit around a standard barbell no problem. They feel very well built and I think they’ll hold up pretty well for awhile. There are more expensive hooks out there but I would save your money and go with these.
customer_reviews.author: justin hill

customer_reviews.title: Great product and work perfectly as advertised!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous and well made product. I use it for hanging therapy for my shoulders so they are dealing with less then 200 pounds but they work perfectly and take all the pressure off my hands. I would highly recommend these for their intended purpose as they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J.

customer_reviews.title: If you heavy lift, these are awesome to have
customer_reviews.text: I began powerlifting this summer and at times when I'm deadlifting, I felt I was not staying in proper form. My friend suggested these saying they would be a big help. He was right and I feel since I started using them my sets are a lot cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy high quality product, just watch the size.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product. I have small hands and its hard to find the right *length* of the hooks. Or more precisely, the webbing that holds them. I liked your design so bought them anyway. However, while the glove fit, the webbing holding the hooks was too long for me -- although fit my friend perfectly, so he claimed them and loves them. This is not a design flaw, just would help to have a measurement of the webbing that holds the hooks. 1" to 1.5" fits me. Maybe I missed it. I like the claw style. And the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and very sturdy. I use them for assisting my grip when doing extended free hangs from a chin up bar as part of my shoulder mobility and strengthening physical therapy routine.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Not great for upright rows.
customer_reviews.text: Great for hanging exercises, however, upright rows and other such exercises have shown that it is very difficult to maintain contact from the clamps with the bar resulting in awkward motions and pauses in repetitions to reposition, especially with curved bar.Quality constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: As I’ve gotten older, my wrists and fingers give out faster than my arms when lifting, and these have made all the difference. I tried someone elses and immediately ordered these. Great product. Velcro bands stay put even on small wrists.
customer_reviews.author: VTTerri

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. I use this when I go kinda heavy around 300 to 350. When i threw on 400 felt like they were going to RIP. So I've been sticking to the 325 range and haven't felt like they where going to RIP. I use every week and haven't had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: jason zambrano

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: There great hooks, 3rd or 4th set I buy. They do what there supposed to. Maxed out the seated cable row and they holded up. My only issue is the felth on the padding, after a while it comes up and it gets a little jammed up with the strap when you try to tighten it. Just reposition and your good. Also, try to avoid moisture, the chrome bracket or the actual hook will rust, but it's also wear and tear will make them get like that. But all in all, satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Javie Ordaz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality build, helps my hands
customer_reviews.text: This has saved my wrists and hands. Sturdy, good quality. The only small complaint would be the strap could use to be about an inch longer, however I have HUGE wrists so I am always having issues with that no matter what the product is. I love these, it really helps with my dead lifts.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Shrugs
customer_reviews.text: I had a different style of deadlifting gloves, but they were not as sturdy as these gloves. Anyhow, they take a little getting use too, but I have no doubt that they will enhance my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Godmod product arrived on time and in great condition
customer_reviews.text: I waited a little before writing my review because I needed so time to use the product. I am truly happy I made the purchase. My hand strength out grew my back strength and these hooks really came in handy. It's a family owned company and deserve the support. They aren't uncomfortable and do the job better than I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: domin8lg

customer_reviews.title: All about doing it right and these gloves help sooo much.
customer_reviews.text: Wow gloves came just as expected and arrived super fast. They are made really well and met all my expectations at the gym !!!! What an awesome back workout I had today best yet. Lovein these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: kay dobbins

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Comfortable on wrist. Really helps with heavy weights,pull ups etc. highly recommended. I just wish the strap that loops is thicker so it wont bunch up on either top of bottom of loop.
customer_reviews.author: NewYorkDude

customer_reviews.title: For hanging works perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use these to hang from a bar and they are working perfectly takes the stress off my hands I would recommend these 100%
customer_reviews.author: carla gould

customer_reviews.title: Great Wrist Relief!
customer_reviews.text: My trainer suggested these to improve my dead-lifts, as I was struggling with wrist pain. I used hers for a few weeks, and had great results, so have purchased my own for future workouts. I have been able to increase my weight and my reps using these wraps. Good construction, and available in fun colors!
customer_reviews.author: CycleGirl

customer_reviews.title: The product is well made and the hooks are solid.
customer_reviews.text: The product is well made and the hooks are solid. Since my hands are small I can't wrap my hands around the hooks and the bar when I'm lifting heavy. For lifting lighter weight you can almost just use the hooks for the lift and isolate the movement. I decided to keep the hooks since they are a good quality and give it to one of my friends at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice high quality lifting hooks. It was just too big for my palms but the seller made it right. Thank you I greatly appreciate that!
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for back day, it helps you go for one more rep even if your hands are tired
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Castillo Flores

customer_reviews.title: Love These Hooks!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these Hooks!!! I feel like the Female version of the Incredible Hulk when I use them. It also keeps my form in check!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but the strap connected to the hooks does ...
customer_reviews.text: Good idea but the strap connected to the hooks does not adjust so it was to long for me and did not work
customer_reviews.author: Plee84

customer_reviews.title: Waste of dough
customer_reviews.text: Looked good in the picture but just a horrible design. Very unnatural and awkward feel. Books do not line up with or support fingers. Also they stretch and do not stay straight. I donated these to my local YMCA and nobody there uses them either.
customer_reviews.author: Fin

customer_reviews.title: Great for form
customer_reviews.text: These are great for lifting weights. They helped keep the bar from slipping out of my hands and from resting on my wrist wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Girl

customer_reviews.title: hooks too fat
customer_reviews.text: I have slim hands and fingers, the hooks are large and difficult for me to grip the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Love it and they work, just got a pair that looked like they were used and had a hole in one were you could see the metal under the pink part.
customer_reviews.author: jena

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great product
customer_reviews.text: I am a heavy person these hook are able to support my weight. They are comfortable, which make doing certain exercises a lot easier. Great product. Only issue, the hook part is bulky. Some difficult gripping the pull up bar.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Nunley

customer_reviews.title: I struggled from 6-8 pull ups to 12 no problem ...
customer_reviews.text: I struggled from 6-8 pull ups to 12 no problem! Cant wait to try these out on deadlifts and front squats.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: useful for tendon stress reduction
customer_reviews.text: good quality, sufficient padding for any weight used, easy to put on and adjust by yourself when working out. Takes pressure off biceps tendon nicely.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Could cause injury
customer_reviews.text: I was shrugging 325 the first day I got them and they tore within 5 mins . The stitching where you loop the velcro thru came undone. I do not reccomend could have been a nasty injury
customer_reviews.author: Brandon marks

customer_reviews.title: ***DID**Love em! 😐
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time today & loved them!! Enabled me to deadlift without having to worry about my grip ****update: hooks broke 3rd use, while not using with heavy weight. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps relieve the weight on fingers when gripping the bar for pullups
customer_reviews.text: These things help me put pull ups back into my exercise routine. Very sturdy. Great for heavy people like me.
customer_reviews.author: reg

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: They work good. They don't them at academy anymore so I go these here and I'm satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: rpcomm

customer_reviews.title: these things will get you hurt
customer_reviews.text: I used these grips for a month or so and developed lifters elbow because they put your grip in a weird position that stresses you forearm muscles. just use regular straps.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas mancino

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, and can help with pull ups or landmine exercises where grip is sometimes compromised. Sturdy and steady with a good design. Looking forward to using it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Holmes

customer_reviews.title: This hooks will help you ROCK your back day!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE them!! Great fit, and i can lift heavier with them!! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: not being able to grip with the right hand it works well with the pull down weights as well as the small dumbells
customer_reviews.author: tom s.

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I use it when I go to the gym and it really helps protect my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Wells

customer_reviews.title: “Life changing”
customer_reviews.text: My dad has been lifting weights for decades. He was a bodybuilder in his youth and called these hooks “life-changing.” I’m inclined to take his word so I ordered two more.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hooks are sturdy but the wrist band is to think for my comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Sienna Wenz

customer_reviews.title: just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: this is great!! i always needed something to protect my hands in the gym when lifting weights. i share it with my brother too and he finds it super helpful
customer_reviews.author: Yonatan Benguira

customer_reviews.title: I used them a couple times and love them already
customer_reviews.text: I used them a couple times and love them already. Fitness is my passion and these are a great replacement for my other straps.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Conine

customer_reviews.title: The worst weight lifting hook at Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the worst weight lifting hook you can find. I use this sort of gear since more than a decade and bought this one at Amazon. First time I tried to use it... You can see the result at the picture. Buy this one, instead: Weight Lifting Rod Hooks Heavy Duty...
customer_reviews.author: Guilherme Bastos

customer_reviews.title: Pull ups are less stress on fingers and wrist
customer_reviews.text: Excellent so far. My wrist are supported so much more.
customer_reviews.author: michael B

customer_reviews.title: The straps seem like nice quality but unfortunately its a faulty design
customer_reviews.text: The straps to these hooks are exceptionally long. They are unusable for me a 5'4" woman. My husband is 6'3" and unable to use them as well. The hooks hang past where you would grip the bar so you would have to not hold the bar with your hands at all and just let the hooks hold them. We have tried to wear them diff ways and nothing works. The straps seem like nice quality but unfortunately its a faulty design.
customer_reviews.author: Getchasome

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for deadlifting. These take the pressure off my husband's grip and helps him lift more weight.
customer_reviews.author: Carol BW

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for lifting heavy and not having grip strength I would definitely recommend these to ppl looking for a added advantage.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

product_meta.title: LEBBOULDER Weight Lifting Rod Hooks Heavy Duty Neoprene Padded Wrist Wraps Power Weight Lifting Training Gym Grips Straps Bandage Set of 2
product_meta.description: Getting jacked isn't all fun and games. At times it can be challenging, testing every ounce of your determination, grit, and focus. That's where we come in.Our grip hooks are designed to help you maximize your weightlifting capacity, by taking care of the nitty gritty, allowing you to concentrate on your workout.Constructed of durable stainless steel and coated with non-slip coating, these hooks will hold tight to the bar, giving you the peace of mind to optimize your workout. Adjustable wrist strap gives you a perfect fit every time, eliminating wrist recurring wrist injuries.
feature_bullets: STRONG GRIP - Coated hooks hold on to heavy weights and don’t let them slip or lose positioning while lifting.
STEEL HOOKS - Long-lasting hooks equals less time, and money, wasted on constantly having to buy new ones.
CUSHIONED INTERIOR - Our hand-friendly gloves will keep your hands feeling comfortable and snug, during even the most intense workouts.
ADJUSTABLE WRIST WRAP - 17.5” adjustable strap guarantees a perfect fit every time, keeping your wrists safe and secure, so you can keep pushing your limits.
MAXIMIZE YOUR WORKOUT - These grip hooks will allow you to optimize lat pull-downs, shrugs, pull-ups, low rows, and other back and shoulder exercises.
